```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Additional libraries
library(odbc)
library(igraph)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(1965)

```

# Load Data

## Institution File

Both institution and peer files originated from https://nces.ed.gov/ipeds.

```{r}
institutions <- read_excel("data/HD2016.xlsx") %>%
  rename_all(tolower) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name = instnm, state = stabbr, control, list_type = dfrcuscg)

institutions
```

## Peer File

```{r}
peers <- read_excel("data/CUSTOMCGIDS2016.xlsx") %>%
  rename_all(tolower) %>%
  select(unitid, peer_unitid = cgunitid)

peers
```

# What Peers Do We Follow?

```{r}
unl_peers <- peers %>%
  filter(unitid==181464) %>%
  inner_join(institutions, by=c('peer_unitid' = 'unitid')) %>%
  mutate(unitid = peer_unitid) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name, state)

unl_peers

```

# Institutions That Consider UNL a Peer

```{r}
unl_monitors <- peers %>%
  filter(peer_unitid==181464) %>%
  count(unitid) %>%
  inner_join(institutions) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name, state)

unl_monitors
```

# Mututal Peers

```{r}
mutual <- unl_monitors %>%
  intersect(unl_peers)

mutual
```

```{r include=FALSE}
base_group <- institutions %>%
  filter(unitid==181464) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name, state) %>%
  union(unl_monitors) %>%
  union(unl_peers) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name, state)

ids <- base_group %>%
  select(unitid)

net_nodes <- peers %>%
  inner_join(ids) %>%
  inner_join(institutions, by=c('peer_unitid' = 'unitid')) %>%
  mutate(unitid = peer_unitid) %>%
  select(unitid, institution_name, state) %>%
  union(base_group)

net_edges <- ids %>%
  inner_join(peers)

# create edges and nodes for the graph
edges <- net_edges
nodes <- net_nodes

# create igraph object from nodes and edges
g <- graph_from_data_frame(d=edges, vertices=nodes, directed=TRUE)

# Set edge names to institution names rather than unitid's
V(g)$label <- V(g)$institution_name
V(g)$group <- 4
V(g)[V(g)$name %in% unl_peers$unitid]$group <- 3
V(g)[V(g)$name %in% mutual$unitid]$group <- 2
V(g)[V(g)$name=="181464"]$group <- 1

#plot the network
# l <- layout_with_kk(g)
l <- layout_with_fr(g)
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(g, edge.arrow.size=.2,
     vertex.size=5,
     vertex.label.cex=.25,
     vertex.label='',
     vertex.color=c("#cc0000","#ff6666","#ffcccc","#e6e6e6")[V(g)$group],
     layout=l)

```
